original_text: The appearance of the wheels and their work was like unto the colour of a beryl: and they four had one likeness: and their appearance and their work was as it were a wheel in the middle of a wheel.
korean_text: 그 바퀴의 모양과 그 구조는 황옥 같이 보이는데 그 넷은 똑같은 모양을 가지고 있으며 그들의 모양과 구조는 바퀴 안에 바퀴가 있는 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: The appearance of wheels and their work
was like unto the colour of a beryl:
and they four had one likeness:
and their appearance and their work
was as it were a wheel in middle of a wheel.
